QuestData.Title: Twilight Plans
QuestData.Description: We're not fully aware of the intentions of the Twilight's Hammer cultists to the southwest. We fear an attack on Lor'danel, however their motives might go well beyond that.$B$BI need you to go to the Twilight Encampment and get your hands on their plans. Hurry, $n. We might not have much time.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 6 Twilight Plans at the Twilight Encampment.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you obtained the plans yet, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent job, $n. Now give me a moment to examine the plans you've brought me.
